options.label: Reset the configuration parameters to default settings
Reset the device to factory default settings

metadata.inclusion: Let your primary Controller/gateway into Inclusion mode, then press once the "Learn" Button in the app of Touch.
metadata.exclusion: Let your primary Controller/gateway into Exclusion mode, then press once the "Learn" Button in the app of Touch.
metadata.reset: Press the "Reset" button in the app of Touch. This procedure only be used when the primary controller is missing or inoperable
